entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
